channel.title: Projects on Hsu Chia Yuan
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Hsu Chia Yuan

item.title: Motorized_Robot_Car
item.description: This is a project I finished in 2018. It is a motorized robot car that can move from one point, detect, pick up an object and bring it to another point. It is built with Utilized Arduino, Solid Works, basic mechanical design and electronics principles. And here’s some picture’s of the car:

item.title: Concentration Card Game
item.description: About the project This is a project I finished in 2019. It is a memory game designed and implemented various data structure using C. https://github.com/hcy1219/C_Project_Concentration_cardgame Images of the game This is the menu of the game. You can pick the mode you want. Human vs. Computer mode: or Computer vs. Computer mode:
